titles.title: Brigadier General George Bud Day, the Most Decorated Veteran in American History Next to General Douglas MacArthur, Act
Brigadier General George Bud Day, the Most Decorated Veteran in American History Next to General Douglas MacArthur, Act
To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 214 Jackson Street in Sioux City, Iowa, as the "General George 'Bud' Day Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 214 Jackson Street in Sioux City, Iowa, as the "General George 'Bud' Day Post Office Building."
